description: Garden Angelica is an amazing plant species with wonderful qualities that make it a great addition to any garden. It is a biennial herb that grows up to 4 feet tall. It produces unique, deeply cut foliage and has large, heads of white to greenish-white flowers that bloom in late summer. It's a great bee forage plant and the blooms are aromatic, making the plant attractive to bees and other beneficial insects. Garden Angelicaâ€™s seeds are edible and the leaves can be used for medicinal infusions and teas. The roots and leaves make a pleasant addition to any salad. Plus, it's easy to grow, so it's perfect for beginners.
